verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, But <S%H539><s%>, behold, they will not believe me <S%H8085><s%>, nor hearken unto my voice <S%H6963><s%>; for they will say <S%H559><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath not appeared unto thee <S%H7200><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3027><s%>, What is that in thy hand? And he said <S%H559><s%>, A rod <S%H4294><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Cast <S%H7993><s%> it on the ground <S%H776><s%>. And he cast <S%H7993><s%> it on the ground <S%H776><s%>, and it became a serpent <S%H5175><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> from before it <S%H6440><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Put forth <S%H7971><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and take <S%H270><s%> it by the tail <S%H2180><s%> (and he put forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and laid hold <S%H2388><s%> of it <S%H4294><s%>, and it became a rod in his hand <S%H3709><s%>);

that they may believe <S%H539><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, hath appeared unto thee <S%H7200><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> furthermore <S%H5750><s%> unto him <S%H935><s%>, Put now thy hand <S%H3027><s%> into thy bosom <S%H2436><s%>. And he put <S%H935><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> into his bosom <S%H2436><s%>: and when he took <S%H3318><s%> it out <S%H3027><s%>, behold, his hand was leprous <S%H6879><s%>, as white as snow <S%H7950><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Put <S%H7725><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> into thy bosom <S%H2436><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>. (And he put <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> into his bosom <S%H2436><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>; and when he took <S%H3318><s%> it out of his bosom <S%H2436><s%>, behold <S%H7725><s%>, it was turned again as his other flesh <S%H1320><s%>.)

And it shall come to pass <S%H539><s%>, if they will not believe thee <S%H8085><s%>, neither hearken to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> sign <S%H226><s%>, that they will believe <S%H539><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the latter <S%H314><s%> sign <S%H226><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H539><s%>, if they will not believe even these two <S%H8147><s%> signs <S%H226><s%>, neither hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto thy voice <S%H6963><s%>, that thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%>, and pour <S%H8210><s%> it upon the dry <S%H3004><s%> land <S%H4325><s%>: and the water which thou takest <S%H3947><s%> out of the river <S%H2975><s%> shall become blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the dry land <S%H3006><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H136><s%>, Oh <S%H994><s%>, Lord <S%H136><s%>, I <S%H376><s%> am not eloquent <S%H1697><s%>, neither heretofore <S%H8032><s%>, nor since <S%H227><s%> thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%>; for I am slow <S%H3515><s%> of speech <S%H6310><s%>, and of a slow <S%H3515><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H7760><s%>, Who hath made man <S%H120><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%>? Or who maketh <S%H7760><s%> a man dumb <S%H483><s%>, or deaf <S%H2795><s%>, or seeing <S%H6493><s%>, or blind <S%H5787><s%>? is it not I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah?
Now therefore go <S%H3212><s%>, and I will be with thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and teach <S%H3384><s%> thee what thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, Oh <S%H994><s%>, Lord <S%H136><s%>, send <S%H7971><s%>, I pray thee <S%H3027><s%>, by the hand of him whom thou wilt send <S%H7971><s%>.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and he said <S%H559><s%>, Is there not Aaron <S%H175><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> the Levite <S%H3881><s%>? I know <S%H3045><s%> that he can speak <S%H1696><s%> well <S%H1696><s%>. And also <S%H3318><s%>, behold, he cometh forth to meet <S%H7125><s%> thee <S%H7200><s%>: and when he seeth thee <S%H8055><s%>, he will be glad in his heart <S%H3820><s%>.

And thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> unto him <S%H7760><s%>, and put the words <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth <S%H6310><s%>: and I will be with thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and with his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and will teach <S%H3384><s%> you what ye shall do <S%H6213><s%>.
And he shall be thy spokesman <S%H1696><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>; and it shall come to pass <S%H6310><s%>, that he shall be to thee a mouth, and thou shalt be to him as God <S%H430><s%>.
And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> in thy hand <S%H3027><s%> this rod <S%H4294><s%>, wherewith thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jethro <S%H3500><s%> his father-in <S%H2859><s%>-law, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3212><s%>, Let me go, I pray thee <S%H7725><s%>, and return unto my brethren <S%H251><s%> that are in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> whether they be yet <S%H5750><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%>. And Jethro <S%H3503><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> in Midian <S%H4080><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%>, return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; for all the men <S%H582><s%> are dead <S%H4191><s%> that sought <S%H1245><s%> thy life <S%H5315><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and set <S%H7392><s%> them upon an ass <S%H2543><s%>, and he returned <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, When thou goest <S%H3212><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, see <S%H7200><s%> that thou do <S%H6213><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> all the wonders <S%H4159><s%> which I have put <S%H7760><s%> in thy hand <S%H3027><s%>: but I will harden <S%H2388><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%>, and he will not let the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>.
And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Israel <S%H3478><s%> is my son <S%H1121><s%>, my first-born <S%H1060><s%>:

and I have said unto thee <S%H1121><s%>, Let my son go <S%H7971><s%>, that he may serve <S%H5647><s%> me <S%H3985><s%>; and thou hast refused to let him go <S%H7971><s%>: behold <S%H2026><s%>, I will slay thy son <S%H1121><s%>, thy first-born <S%H1060><s%>.
And it came to pass on the way <S%H1870><s%> at the lodging-place <S%H4411><s%>, that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> met <S%H6298><s%> him <S%H1245><s%>, and sought to kill him <S%H4191><s%>.

Then Zipporah <S%H6855><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a flint <S%H6864><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> the foreskin <S%H6190><s%> of her son <S%H1121><s%>, and cast <S%H5060><s%> it at his feet <S%H7272><s%>; and she said <S%H559><s%>, Surely a bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> of blood art thou to me <S%H1818><s%>.
So he let him alone <S%H7503><s%>. Then she said <S%H559><s%>, A bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> art thou <S%H4139><s%>, because of the circumcision.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>. And he went <S%H3212><s%>, and met <S%H6298><s%> him in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and kissed him <S%H5401><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> wherewith he had sent <S%H7971><s%> him <S%H226><s%>, and all the signs wherewith he had charged him <S%H6680><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and gathered together <S%H622><s%> all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

and Aaron <S%H175><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and did <S%H6213><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> believed <S%H539><s%>: and when they heard <S%H8085><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had visited <S%H6485><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and that he had seen <S%H7200><s%> their affliction <S%H6040><s%>, then they bowed their heads <S%H6915><s%> and worshipped <S%H7812><s%>.
